name: Space Reflector (KanyaTr, yeahboiiie)
description:
A shoot-em-up game where you can't shoot! Yes, the only way of killing enemies is to deflect their bullets back at them with the greatest mankind invention - a big mirror on a stick!

All the game graphics, code and music (except sounds) were made by hand without using any assets or any other stuff like that.

Sounds are from different open source sites.

This was made for weekly game jam 148. Feedback is appreciated (But if it's screen resolution issues, yeah, i know, i ruined the game, sorry!).
